comments: If you want to waste your time take this professor. He clearly does not know what he wants and will not be able to explain what he wants from you as a student. Kind of funny such a horrible professor is working in humanities.

He was very boring and seemed put out during his lectures. I basicly did what I wanted on the assignment and still did pretty good because he uses the book and the book was confusing and more complex then it needed. He is slow getting your grades back to you. He grades rather hard.
He is a total nerd babe. Pretty good with questions ans clarity. I enjoyed the class.
